name: George's Ground Beef Stroganoff

instructions.en: Brown ground beef with onions, celery, garlic, salt, and pepper in a large Dutch oven until meat is cooked and vegetables are tender. Drain grease.
instructions.sk: Opečte mleté mäso s cibuľou, zelerom, cesnakom, soľou a korením vo veľkom liatinovom hrnci, kým mäso nie je prepečené a zelenina mäkká. Zlejte mastnotu.
instructions.ja: 大きなダッチオーブンで挽肉、玉ねぎ、セロリ、ニンニク、塩、コショウを肉に火が通り野菜が柔らかくなるまで炒めます。脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Add bouillon, dill weed, pickle relish, and mushrooms. Simmer for 5 minutes, stirring often.
instructions.sk: Pridajte bujón, kôpor, nakladanú uhorku a huby. Varte 5 minút za častého miešania.
instructions.ja: ブイヨン、ディルウィード、ピクルスレリッシュ、マッシュルームを加えます。頻繁に混ぜながら5分間煮込みます。

instructions.en: Remove from heat and stir in sour cream. Adjust seasonings as needed.
instructions.sk: Odstavte z ohňa a vmiešajte kyslú smotanu. Podľa potreby upravte ochutenie.
instructions.ja: 火を止めてサワークリームを混ぜ込みます。必要に応じて味を調整します。

notes: Makes about 6 servings. Serve over pasta substitute of your choice (not included in nutritional info). George originally used fresh dill.
